member.name: T:MyWebApi.Controllers.WeatherForecastController
member.summary: This controller is responsible for handling weather forecasts.

member.name: M:MyWebApi.Controllers.WeatherForecastController.Get
member.summary: Get a list of weather forecasts.

members.member:
Insert a new weather forecast.
The weather forecast to insert. The inserted weather forecast. Returns the newly created weather forecast. If the weather forecast is null. If there was an error inserting the weather forecast. remarks>

Update an existing weather forecast.
The id of the weather forecast to update. The updated weather forecast.
Returns no content if the weather forecast was updated successfully. If the weather forecast is null. If there was an error updating the weather forecast. remarks>

Get a weather forecast by id.
The id of the weather forecast to get. The weather forecast. Returns the weather forecast. If the weather forecast is null. If there was an error getting the weather forecast. remarks>

member.name: P:MyWebApi.Models.WeatherForecast.Date
member.summary: Gets or sets the date of the forecast.

member.name: P:MyWebApi.Models.WeatherForecast.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the forecast.

member.name: P:MyWebApi.Models.WeatherForecast.TemperatureC
member.summary: Gets or sets the temperature in Celsius.

member.name: P:MyWebApi.Models.WeatherForecast.TemperatureF
member.summary: Gets or sets the temperature in Fahrenheit.

member.name: P:MyWebApi.Models.WeatherForecast.Summary
member.summary: Gets or sets the summary of the forecast.

member.name: P:MyWebApi.Models.WeatherForecast.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the detailed description of the forecast.
